mapper.select: SELECT soma.soma_comment.comment_id as commentId, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer_id as commentWriterId, comment_parent_id as commentParentId, comment_created_at as commentCreatedAt, comment_updated_at as commentUpdatedAt, comment_status as commentStatus FROM soma.soma_comment inner join soma_article_comment on soma.soma_comment.comment_id = soma.soma_article_comment.comment_id WHERE soma_article_comment.article_id = #{article_id} ORDER BY soma_comment.comment_id DESC
